title: Multiple dead after NYC-bound tour bus crashes: Indian, asian tourists among victims
content: A tour bus, carrying mostly Indian, Chinese, and Filipino nationals, crashed in upstate New York on Friday, resulting in fatalities and injuries. The bus, en route to New York City from Niagara Falls, overturned near Pembroke for unknown reasons. Rescue operations are underway, with a child among the deceased. Many passengers were ejected or remain trapped.

title: Trump picks Sergio Gor as next US ambassador to India; Senate nod awaited
content: Donald Trump announced Sergio Gor, the current director of the White House Presidential personnel office, as the next US ambassador to India and Special Envoy for South and Central Asian Affairs. Trump praised Gor as a trusted friend and someone capable of delivering on his agenda. Gor's confirmation by the Senate is pending, after which he will succeed Eric Garcetti.

title: 'Illegal' in India, jailed in Bangladesh: 'Nowhere woman' prays for miracle
content: Birbhum resident Sunali, expecting a child any time now, was escorted into a Bangladesh jail on Friday not knowing to which country her unborn baby would belong. The 26-year-old's Aadhaar and voter identity card hadn't saved her from being branded an "illegal immigrant" in Delhi, where she was working until recently.

title: iPhone 17 launch nears: Foxconn gets instructions; send back your engineers to China
content: Foxconn subsidiary Yuzhan Technology has recalled approximately 300 Chinese engineers from its India operations, marking the second such instance recently. This action follows reports that Beijing requested Foxconn chairman Young Liu to assess the company's Indian investments.

title: CJI on HC ex-judge: SC quashed all his judgments, fortunately he has retired
content: The Supreme Court expressed relief as Justice Sureshwar Thakur, known for his incomprehensible judgments, retired from the Punjab and Haryana High Court. The CJI and Justice Chandran, while hearing appeals against Thakur's verdict in a murder case, noted the consistent overturning of his decisions by the SC.

title: Gujarat's pride to remain MP's envy? Plan to bring lions to Kuno likely shelved
content: A July 30 forest department notification announcing renaming of the 'Lion Project' in MP's Kuno National Park to 'Cheetah Project', and redesignation of its director to "field director, Cheetah Project, Shivpuri", has led many to suspect that Asiatic lions won't roar in what was supposed to be their second home in India after Gir.

title: J&K government takes over schools affiliated to banned Jamaat
content: The order cites concerns flagged by intelligence agencies that they were found directly or indirectly affiliated with proscribed JeI and FAT. Deputy commissioners will take over management and take appropriate steps to ensure the "academic career" of the students is not affected in any manner, the order says. The order, issued late Friday, drew strong reactions in the Valley.

title: 'Eliminating all retaliatory tariffs on US goods': Canada's big announcement
content: Canada will eliminate tariffs on American goods covered by USMCA starting September 1. This follows a call between Prime Minister Mark Carney and US President Donald Trump. Both countries are intensifying discussions on a broader trade deal. Canada will retain tariffs on steel, aluminum, and autos. The USMCA is scheduled for review in 2026.

title: Elon Musk teen prodigy quits after 2 years: Tech CEO respond; says ‘Never heard of him’
content: Elon Musk claims ignorance of Kairan Quazi's SpaceX departure, despite the 16-year-old prodigy's two-year tenure at the company. Quazi, who joined SpaceX at 14, is transitioning to Citadel Securities, citing a desire for faster-paced challenges in quantitative finance. He previously criticized LinkedIn for age-based restrictions, highlighting biases in opportunity gatekeeping.

title: 'Too harsh': What SC said on earlier Delhi stray dogs order - 'sterilise, immune, release'
content: The Supreme Court has revised its order regarding stray dogs in Delhi-NCR, permitting the release of sterilised, immunised, and dewormed dogs back to their original locations, except for those with rabies or aggressive tendencies. The court also banned public feeding, mandating designated feeding zones, and extended the ruling nationwide, directing compliance with ABC Rules and planning a unified national policy.

title: Savannah James opens up: Family tattoo with LeBron & sons — heartfelt bonding moment
content: Savannah James was accompanied by LeBron James and their sons, Bronny and Bryce, for a rare family tattoo session. Bryce expressed his dislike for his mother getting inked as Savannah documented the moment. The tattoo artist, Ganga, shared a glimpse of the family outing, highlighting LeBron's presence and hinting at a theme of togetherness for the tattoos.

title: Opposition afraid for its netas... we have seen files being signed from jail: PM Modi
content: "If a government employee is imprisoned for 50 hours, then he loses his job automatically, be it a driver, a clerk or a peon. But a CM, a minister, or even a PM, can enjoy staying in govt even from jail... Some time ago, we saw how files were being signed from jail and govt orders were given from jail," Modi said at a rally in Magadh University, Bodh Gaya.

title: Stephen A. Smith’s daughter admits Bryce James crush; dad reacts
content: Samantha Smith, daughter of Stephen A. Smith, made surprising revelations on his show. She confessed to having a crush on Bryce James a year ago. This happened before the feud between her father and LeBron James. Stephen was shocked by this. The discussion also covered Samantha's dating life. Stephen humorously referenced 'Bad Boys II' to express his protectiveness.

title: Fantasy Football 2025: Commanders RB race heats up — Ekeler, Merritt step in post-Robinson
content: Following Brian Robinson Jr.'s trade to the 49ers, Austin Ekeler is poised to lead the Commanders' backfield, offering PPR value. Rookie Jacory Croskey-Merritt, impressing in preseason, emerges as a potential fantasy sleeper. With unconvincing options behind them, the Commanders' backfield hinges on Ekeler's stability and Croskey-Merritt's explosive upside, making them key fantasy considerations.

title: Patrick Mahomes injury update: Chiefs star set to play — limited snaps vs Bears tonight
content: Patrick Mahomes and key starters will play in the Chiefs' preseason finale against the Bears, confirmed by coach Andy Reid. While their appearance is expected to be brief, it offers a crucial opportunity to fine-tune timing and assess the team's readiness. This strategic move prioritizes the health and rhythm of star players ahead of the regular season.

title: Powell buckles to Trump? US Fed chair signals rate cut soon - what he said
content: Federal Reserve Chairman Jerome Powell hinted at a possible rate cut during September's meeting, balancing inflation concerns with employment risks. He acknowledged a slowing economy and the impact of trade and immigration policies. While the labor market shows balance, downside risks to employment are rising, influencing the Fed's data-driven approach to policy adjustments.

title: Malik Beasley update: Knicks show interest — cleared Pistons guard hits free agency market
content: The New York Knicks have reportedly maintained interest in Malik Beasley, the three-point shooting guard, since their playoff series in May. Beasley is now a potential free agent after an ESPN report cleared him from a federal gambling investigation. The Knicks, who have been doing background work on Beasley, could offer him a veteran minimum contract.

title: Online Gaming Bill 2025: Dream11 shifts to free-to-play online social game
content: Dream11 has ceased all paid contests on its platform, transitioning to a free-to-play model in response to The Promotion and Regulation of Online Gaming Bill, 2025. The new law prohibits money-based online gaming, leading Dream11 to comply while continuing its other sports-tech ventures. The company expressed respect for the law and looks forward to its next phase.

title: Trump says Chicago, New York next in line for federal crime crackdown
content: Donald Trump announced intensified federal action against crime in Chicago and New York. This follows deployment of national guard personnel to Washington DC. Trump cited rising lawlessness as the reason. Local officials criticised the move as politically motivated. The administration argues federal intervention is necessary where local leadership is ineffective. Critics worry about politicising policing.

title: Where is Dhankhar? Playing table tennis, practicing yoga
content: Amidst opposition's inquiries about Jagdeep Dhankhar's whereabouts post-resignation, sources reveal he's engaged in yoga and table tennis. His abrupt departure, citing health reasons, has fueled speculation, drawing comparisons to past Vice Presidents who resigned early. The Election Commission has announced the Vice Presidential election for September 9.

title: Asia Cup: Ex-Australia cricketer stunned by Shreyas Iyer's omission
content: Former Australia wicketkeeper and Punjab Kings assistant coach Brad Haddin has criticised Shreyas Iyer's exclusion from India's Asia Cup 2025 squad, calling it an “extraordinary selection.” Haddin highlighted Iyer's leadership and performance under pressure, expressing surprise at the decision. Iyer recently led Punjab Kings to the IPL 2025 final with a strong batting performance.

title: US defence secretary arms National Guard in DC; Trump warns of full federal takeover
content: The Pentagon has announced that National Guard troops deployed in Washington, D.C., for President Trump's law enforcement crackdown will now be armed, marking a significant escalation in security measures. Defence Secretary Pete Hegseth issued the order, while nearly 2,000 National Guard members remain stationed in the city. Trump declared D.C. is safe again, praising the National Guard and police.

title: 7 early symptoms of cancer that often get dismissed as minor illnesses
content: Cancer remains a leading global cause of death, often due to late diagnosis. Recognizing early symptoms is crucial for improved treatment outcomes. Unexplained weight loss, persistent fatigue, unusual lumps, chronic pain, skin changes, unusual bleeding, and frequent infections can be early warning signs. Prompt medical attention for these symptoms is essential for early detection and better prognosis.

title: Tom Brady shares rare family moments while celebrating son Jack’s birthday
content: Tom Brady celebrated his son Jack's 18th birthday on August 22, 2025, with a heartfelt Instagram post. The former quarterback expressed immense pride in the 'graceful, kind, and courageous' young man Jack has become. Brady shared throwback photos of their shared moments, from sports to travel, noting how Jack has surpassed him in height.

title: Goods and Services Tax Council to meet for 2-day session starting Sept 3
content: The GST Council is set to meet on September 3rd to discuss proposed GST rate rationalization. A Group of Ministers has endorsed a simplified structure with 5% and 18% slabs, potentially eliminating the 12% and 28% brackets.

title: US wants no truck with foreign drivers, suspends visas
content: Following a fatal accident involving an undocumented Indian truck driver, the Trump administration has suspended worker visas for foreign commercial drivers. The incident, which resulted in the death of three Americans, has ignited a political dispute over sanctuary policies and driver qualifications.

title: 'Engines are suffering': PIL in SC challenges nationwide sale of E20 petrol
content: A PIL has been filed in the Supreme Court challenging the nationwide E20 rollout, citing potential vehicle damage and lack of consumer awareness. The plea demands ethanol-free petrol availability and clear labeling of ethanol content at fuel stations. While the government aims for 100% E20 by 2025 to cut emissions, concerns persist regarding vehicle compatibility and fuel efficiency.

title: 'Entire country knows he steals votes': Rahul Gandhi hits out at PM Modi
content: Rahul Gandhi launched a strong attack on PM Modi and the BJP-led NDA government during a rally in Bhagalpur, accusing them of attempting 'vote theft' in Bihar through the Election Commission. He alleged the government's policies are destroying employment opportunities for the youth, citing issues like paper leaks and the Agniveer scheme.

title: Sunita Ahuja once broke silence on divorce rumors with Govinda: If anyone dares to separate us...'
content: Sunita Ahuja recently addressed divorce rumors, clarifying that separate living arrangements are for practical reasons. She affirmed her strong bond with Govinda. In a vlog, Sunita visited temples in Chandigarh, expressing deep faith in Maa Mahakali. She recounted praying for a happy marriage and life with Govinda. Sunita believes the goddess has always fulfilled her wishes.

title: 'This math isn't mathing': RCB's role in Patidar's MP captaincy questioned, sparks debate
content: Aakash Chopra has ignited controversy by questioning RCB's influence on Rajat Patidar's captaincy in domestic cricket. Mo Bobat revealed he encouraged Patidar to seek leadership roles at the state level, leading to his appointment as Madhya Pradesh captain. Chopra found it questionable for IPL franchises to 'nudge' players into domestic captaincy roles, sparking debate about the ethics of such influence.

title: Do humans really live on Snake Island? The truth behind Brazil’s deadly isle
content: Snake Island, off the coast of Brazil, is uninhabited due to its dense population of highly venomous golden lancehead vipers, whose bite can be fatal. The Brazilian government restricts access to protect both humans and the endangered snakes. Despite the danger, the island's unique ecosystem is crucial for the vipers' survival, highlighting the need for conservation efforts.

title: PM Modi to visit Japan on August 29; next stop China for SCO summit - key details
content: Prime Minister Narendra Modi is set to embark on a diplomatic tour from August 29 to September 1, visiting Japan and China. In Japan, he will attend the 15th India-Japan Annual Summit, his first with Prime Minister Shigeru Ishiba, to strengthen bilateral ties. Subsequently, he will travel to China for the Shanghai Cooperation Organisation Summit in Tianjin, engaging with other world leaders to promote regional cooperation.

title: India’s space story: Isro shows how Bharatiya Antariksh Station will look
content: India's space program reached a new milestone with the unveiling of the Bharatiya Antariksh Station (BAS) model. ISRO plans to launch the first module by 2028, joining an elite group with orbital labs. The BAS-01, weighing 10 tonnes, will orbit 450 km above Earth.

title: Samuel Basallo signs $67M deal: 8-year Orioles extension — follows MLB debut breakthrough
content: Samuel Basallo, just days after his MLB debut, has signed an eight-year, $67 million contract extension with the Baltimore Orioles. The deal, potentially reaching $88.5 million with incentives, marks the largest pre-arbitration extension for a catcher. Basallo's arrival raises questions about Adley Rutschman's role, as the Orioles consider how to best utilize both catchers' talents.

title: 'Lowlife': Trump claims of having limited information on search of Bolton's home
content: Donald Trump has sharply criticized John Bolton, labeling him a "lowlife" and disavowing any prior knowledge of the FBI raid on Bolton's Maryland home. Trump accused Bolton of influencing George Bush to initiate bombings in the Middle East, further alleging that Bolton is eager to incite violence and questioning his patriotism.

title: Asia Cup: How Jitesh Sharma kept the competition at bay
content: Wicket-keeper batter Jitesh Sharma, after a period of self-reflection following his initial T20I appearances, has made a remarkable comeback to the Indian team. His resurgence was fueled by a strong IPL season with Royal Challengers Bengaluru, where he showcased his finishing abilities and even captained the team in Rajat Patidar's absence.

title: 'They have only one agenda': Amit Shah's attack on Stalin, Sonia - top quotes
content: Union Home Minister Amit Shah criticized MK Stalin and Sonia Gandhi for dynastic politics during a BJP meeting in Tamil Nadu. He expressed confidence in the NDA forming a government in the state, highlighting alleged DMK corruption and lauding PM Modi's governance inspired by Thirukkural.

title: Adam Thielen turns 35: Vikings eye reunion move — former WR could return to Minnesota
content: On Adam Thielen's 35th birthday, the Minnesota Vikings reportedly inquired about reacquiring the wide receiver from the Carolina Panthers, according to NFL Insider Adam Schefter. With Jordan Addison suspended and Jalen Nailor injured, Thielen could potentially start on opening night. Vikings fans expressed excitement about Thielen's possible return, citing his experience, leadership, and familiarity with the system as valuable assets.

title: Inside Arch Manning's wild recruitment saga
content: Getting the heir to football's QB dynasty to commit was destined to be crazy. But this was even beyond that.

title: Sources: Commanders trading Robinson to 49ers
content: The Commanders are trading running back Brian Robinson Jr. to the 49ers for a 2026 sixth-round pick, sources told ESPN's Adam Schefter.

title: NCAA 'concerned' by football prediction markets
content: The NCAA has expressed concern over the lack of guardrails for online prediction markets after financial company Robinhood announced Tuesday that it's allowing trades on the outcome of college football games this season.

title: Panthers extend Moton; Vikes ask about Thielen
content: The Carolina Panthers have extended the contract of right tackle Taylor Moton through the 2027 season, the team announced on Friday.

title: Red Sox move Buehler to pen as RHP eyes 'reset'
content: The Red Sox are moving Walker Buehler to the bullpen, manager Alex Cora said before the team's Friday night game against the Yankees in New York.

title: Sources: Steelers DT Harmon out with MCL sprain
content: Pittsburgh Steelers first-round pick Derrick Harmon sustained a medial collateral ligament (MCL) sprain in Thursday night's preseason game and is expected to be sidelined, sources confirmed to ESPN.

title: Bradley: Ryder Cup 'biggest decision' of my life
content: Keegan Bradley said Friday he has a "pretty good idea" who his six captain's picks will be for the Ryder Cup.

title: 'House Rhules': Huskers coach's pod to boost NIL
content: Nebraska coach Matt Rhule debuted his weekly podcast on Thursday, hoping to build the Cornhuskers' brand and contribute to NIL for his players.

title: Secretariat Triple Crown jockey Turcotte, 84, dies
content: Hall of Fame jockey Ron Turcotte, who rode Secretariat to the Triple Crown in 1973, has died. He was 84.

title: Preseason report cards for every single rookie selected in the 2025 NFL draft
content: How did Travis Hunter look in training camp? What's next for Tyler Shough? We checked in on all 32 teams' rookie classes.

title: Preseason Week 3 takeaways and roster projections: Will Giants' DeVito make the cut?
content: The final games of the 2025 preseason help flesh out key battles ahead of Tuesday's 53-man roster cuts.

title: Tough draft-day decisions: Can you pick a top-5 QB and top-3 TE and like your team?
content: Daniel Dopp shares takeaways from more than 100 drafts to help you make tough decisions in your upcoming drafts.

title: Red Sox in must-win mode? Are Yankees back? What you should -- and shouldn't -- believe in the American League
content: How big is this series with New York for Boston? Is Toronto the best team in the AL? We give verdicts on what it all means.

title: How a swing tweak took Roman Anthony to the next level
content: The Red Sox rookie made his Yankee Stadium debut with a bang, but lately, he has been pummeling everybody.

title: 'We are what we drive': How car dealers became college football's power brokers
content: More college football players are driving sports cars than ever before. But the connection between dealers and programs goes back decades.

title: LeBron, KD and an unprecedented next chapter in their 20-year rivalry
content: For two decades, the two superstars have led superteams to NBA glory. Now, for the first time, they're both looking up at one -- and perhaps the best one yet.

title: Brian Robinson Jr. to the 49ers, Devaughn Vele to the Saints
content: Who won the 49ers-Commanders trade? Why did the Saints give up so much for a 27-year-old wide receiver? We sized up preseason NFL deals.

title: Which of the top-10 2025 recruits will play big roles? We have intel on each player
content: These formerly top-10 recruits are ready to start the season. Some will have bigger impacts than others.

title: Man United have a goalkeeper problem, but solving it might have to wait
content: Manchester United's loss to Arsenal in the opening weekend exposed their weakness between the sticks, but Ruben Amorim might be forced to press on with the players he has.

title: The best worst transfers: Why the likes of Sancho, Werner were actually smart signings
content: Sometimes, a transfer should work out, but doesn't. Here are the best worst transfers over the past decade in the Premier League and beyond.

title: 'Dak's gotta be able to run': How will Prescott's hamstring affect his usage in 2025?
content: A hamstring avulsion ended Prescott's 2024 season in Week 9, but he's been pushing it this offseason.

title: Reid's annual HBCU watch list: Ranking the top 10 prospects for the 2026 NFL draft
content: Ahead of Saturday's Cricket MEAC/SWAC Challenge Kickoff, we ranked 10 HBCU players who could be on next year's NFL draft radar.

title: Real or Not, WNBA playoff race edition: Who’s in, who’s out and which teams will host
content: Which teams might host? Could New York fall to the 4-seed? We examine the teams in the WNBA playoff hunt.

title: 2025 LLBWS success builds on Connecticut championship history
content: The 2025 LLBWS adds to Connecticut's championship appearances at the amateur level. Learn more about the state's collegiate titles now.

title: AFC West preview: Chargers and Broncos will surpass expectations
content: Will the Chargers or Broncos leapfrog the Chiefs? Raiders on the rise? Here are all the odds for each team in the AFC West and our favorite bets.

title: NFC West preview: 49ers and Rams top odds, but don't count out Seahawks and Cards
content: The NFC West projects to be a tight, four-team race. Here are the odds for each team and our favorite bets.

title: How mid-major coaches are embracing -- or resisting -- being high-major launchpads
content: Some mid-major coaches lean into pitching their programs as a development step. Others are reluctant.

title: PLL quarterfinals preview: Key stats, matchups, how to watch
content: Which teams will advance to take on the Atlas and Outlaws in the next round? Here's what you need to know.

title: NBA 2K26 reveals top 20 rated players
content: The best players in NBA 2K26 have been revealed. Has Nikola Jokic kept the top spot, or will Shai Gilgeous-Alexander displace him?

title: Political parties compete to take credit for Kolkata metro line expansion
content: Trinamool, BJP, and CPI(M) speak about their individual contributions to the Kolkata metropolitan metro line expansion and connectivity

title: Assam village chiefs made stakeholders in vulture conservation
content: A gram pradhan said incidents of poisoning the scavenging birds were outcomes of attempts by people to fight cattle predation by wild carnivores and feral dogs

title: ‘Link in bio’ site Linktree unblocked, paid Indian users to receive extension, firm says
content: The largest ‘link in bio’ service Linktree, which helps Instagram users aggregate URLs they can’t include in posts on a single page, has been unblocked, days after The Hindu reported on its blocking.

title: Indians in Ireland: Building a home amid the hostility
content: On July 19, 2025, an Indian man was assaulted in the suburb of Tallaght in Dublin, Ireland. Since then, there have been several attacks against Indians in the green isle, causing alarm in the immigrant community. With politicians there riding on anti-immigrant rhetoric, the situation has worsened. Priyanka Borpujari reports on how the transformation of Ireland as a major immigrant destination has brought many challenges

title: Farmers in distress as fertilisers in short supply in U.P.: Cong.
content: State Congress president accuses govt. of ‘remaining a mute spectator’ and failing to address the acute shortage

title: Coimbatore Unlimited 3.0 | Tamil Nadu has huge potential for development of integrated townships, say panellists
content: While investors look at tier-one cities to fund development of integrated townships, the scope is more in tier-two cities as land is available in the suburban areas, they say

title: West Bengal Joint Entrance Examinations results declared after three-month delay
content: The results follow an unprecedented delay owing to legal complications surrounding the revisions in the list of Other Backward Classes (OBC)

title: Karnataka’s financial burden due to indiscipline spend of erstwhile BJP govt and cut in Central funding and not guarantees: CM
content: He describes guarantee schemes as development schemes that have helped increase the State’s per capita income

title: Ladakh administration revokes allotment of land for Sonam Wangchuk’s institute
content: Mr. Wangchuk has led the protests in Ladakh for three years; an order said the land has not been used for the purpose allotted “as no University (as recognised by law) has been set up” till date

title: Withdraw FIR against Abhisar Sharma: Press Club
content: The PCI accused the Assam Police of turning “a blind eye in not taking cognisance of what the apex court has directed in a similar case pertaining to The Wire editors”

title: Caste census: In a first, panel to use domestic electricity connection to draw up list of households in Karnataka
content: The earlier surveys, including that of SCs for internal quota, have relied on census data and voter list

title: Mumbai hosts youth-led climate consultation as India prepares for COP30 in Brazil
content: Participants aged 13-25 in Mumbai pledge action and to co-create solutions to contribute to India’s National Youth Statement

title: Karnataka HC finds no fault in compulsorily retiring civil judge for threatening police inspector
content: We find no infirmity with either the procedure adopted nor find that the punishment imposed is highly disproportionate, the bench observed in its order

title: West Bengal being a border State faces threat of infiltration, says Modi
content: Infiltrators changing State’s demography, putting pressure on resources and posing a threat to women’s safety, but Trinamool and Congress are supporting them for appeasement politics, says PM

title: India-China border trade through Lipu Lekh ‘unexpected and unacceptable’ to Nepal, says former Nepali Foreign Minister
content: Nepal to send diplomatic note, claims the Kalapani-Lipu Lekh-Limpiyadhura region as its sovereign territory; such claims not justified, says MEA; plans for Nepali PM to visit India still on track

title: US Defense Intelligence Agency Chief To Be Removed
content: The head of the US Defense Intelligence Agency (DIA) is being removed, a senior defense official said Friday -- the latest in a series of top officers to be fired this year.

title: Donald Trump Names Close Political Aide Sergio Gor As India Ambassador
content: President Donald Trump on Friday nominated close political aide Sergio Gor as ambassador to India, also naming him as an envoy to negotiate across South Asia.

title: GST Council To Hold 2-Day Meeting On September 3-4 To Discuss Key Reforms
content: The high-powered GST Council, chaired by Finance Minister Nirmala Sitharaman, will meet on September 3-4 to discuss moving to a two-slab taxation.

title: Getting Zelensky-Putin Together Like Mixing "Oil And Vinegar", Says Trump
content: US President Donald Trump on Friday said setting up a meeting between Ukrainian President Voldymyr Zelensky and Russian leader Vladimir Putin is as hard as mixing "oil and vinegar."

title: Multiple Dead, Several Injured As Bus Crashes In New York State
content: A tour bus returning to New York City from Niagara Falls crashed Friday, killing and injuring multiple people, police said.

title: 12 Killed, 4 Missing As Bridge Collapses In China
content: Twelve people were killed and four are missing after part of a bridge under construction collapsed Friday in northwest China, state media reported.

title: German Post Office Halts Package Deliveries To US Over Trump Tariffs
content: Germany's postal service announced Friday a raft of temporary restrictions on package deliveries to the United States due to tariffs imposed by President Donald Trump.

title: "No Meeting Planned" Between Putin, Zelensky: Russia
content: Russian Foreign Minister Sergei Lavrov said Friday there was "no meeting planned" between the Russian and Ukrainian presidents, despite US attempts to organise the summit.

title: Pakistan Floods Turn Wedding Celebrations Into 24 Funerals For A Family
content: Two days before his wedding, Noor Muhammad had a long phone call with his mother, just hours before devastating floods in Pakistan killed her along with 23 family members and relatives.

title: "Propaganda, Political Mileage": BJP vs Congress On Dharmasthala Row
content: Politics over the Dharmasthala "mass burial" case is heating up, with the BJP accusing the Congress of trying to defame the holy temple town and the Congress saying a professional investigation is being carried out without any pressure from anybody.

title: National Guard Deployed In Washington Will Be Armed Soon, Says Pentagon
content: Defense Secretary Pete Hegseth has ordered that National Guard troops patrolling the streets of Washington for President Donald Trump's law enforcement crackdown will be armed, the Pentagon said Friday.

title: "Threw Hand Grenades": Russian Children Get Taste Of Military Training At 8
content: Scores of schoolchildren enjoyed a riverside adventure in southern Russia this week, but it was no ordinary holiday camp.

title: All About John Bolton Whose Home And Office Were Raided By FBI
content: John Bolton, whose home and office were searched by federal agents on Friday, has been one of the most vocal critics of President Donald Trump since serving as a national security adviser in Trump's first administration.

title: 215 Jamaat-Linked Schools Taken Over By Jammu And Kashmir Government
content: The Jammu and Kashmir government has taken over the management of 215 schools linked to the banned Jamaat-e-Islami.

title: Rajasthan Woman Kills Alcoholic Live-In Partner, Carries On With Chores
content: A 30-year-old woman in Rajasthan's Jhalawar strangled her live-in partner to death after tying his hands and feet with rope over his alcohol addiction.

title: "Politicians Think They Are Privileged Class": Harish Salve On Bill To Sack Ministers
content: The politician is only told that you "will not run your sachivalaya(secretariat) from a prison cell" and that is perfectly sensible, Harish Salve, a former Solicitor General of India, told NDTV amid row on bills to sack ministers who have been in jai

title: Funeral Owner To Be Sentenced For Corpse Abuse After Storing 200 Bodies
content: It's been two years since nearly 200 decaying bodies were discovered throughout a fetid, room temperature building in rural Colorado.

title: TikTok Still Blocked: Government Sources On Buzz About Ban Being Lifted
content: TikTok is still blocked in India, government sources said this evening after several users reported that they could access the website of the video streaming platform.

title: 2 Tiger Cubs Die At Delhi Zoo, Two Others Under Care
content: Two tiger cubs born at Delhi zoo earlier this month died, leaving just two survivors from a rare litter of six.

title: Ranchi Medical Student On Ventilator After Sipping Tea From Canteen
content: A first-year postgraduate student of Obstetrics and Gynaecology at Jharkhand's apex health institute RIMS in Ranchi is on a ventilator after allegedly drinking tea from the hospital's canteen.

title: Left behind, eight-year-old Odisha girl spends night stuck in school window
content: Teachers and students had hurriedly locked the classrooms and left the premises—unaware the girl was still inside, fast asleep.

title: Modi government has closed all paths of employment for youth, says Rahul Gandhi
content: The Congress leader, while addressing a public meeting in Kahalgaon during the Voter Adhikar Yatra, says the names of people voting for the Opposition are being removed in SIR; Tejashwi Yadav asserts the people of Bihar will teach lessons to Chief Minister Nitish Kumar

title: 40% of Chief Ministers face criminal cases: ADR
content: The poll rights body’s report comes even as the Centre has introduced three bills that seek the removal of Prime Minister, Chief Ministers, and Ministers arrested for 30 days on serious criminal charges

title: L-G Sinha sacks two government employees for anti-national activities in J&K
content: The L_G invokes speacial provisions of Article 311 to fire a teacher and an assistant stockman in the Sheep Husbandry Department

title: Good response to films on Day 1 of IDSFFK
content: Over the course of the six-day festival, 331 films from 52 countries will be screened across 29 categories

title: TNPGCL to take up development of 660 MW Ennore Thermal Power Station expansion project under PPP mode
content: As per the State Energy Department’s policy note for 2025-26, ETPS Expansion Thermal Power Project has faced significant challenges over the years

title: Ministry of External Affairs announces PM Modi’s visit to Japan, China
content: The MEA said Mr. Modi will be in Japan on August 29 and 30 to participate in the 15th India-Japan annual summit; on August 31, he will travel to the Chinese city of Tianjin to attend the Shanghai Cooperation Organisation summit

title: Forest rights of tribal people were not settled for Nicobar project: council
content: Tribal representative body complains to Minister; says Andaman and Nicobar administration gave a ‘false’ report to Centre stating that tribespeople’s rights under FRA were identified and settled with regard to diversion of forest land for the ₹72,000-crore project

title: Probe launched as girl students allege sexual harassment by two teachers of government school near Coimbatore
content: The girls made the allegations in two videos circulated on messaging platforms on Friday. They accused two male teachers of touching girl students inappropriately and looking at them with a bad intent. They said another male teacher was coming to school under the influence of alcohol

title: Create awareness of non-communicable diseases in children: rights panel chief
content: Lifestyle diseases and genetic disorders are posing a huge challenge these days and children with such conditions need special support, says K.V. Manoj Kumar

title: Dance ballet hails the glory of the ‘seven sacred hills’
content: Students mesmerise audience with Sapthagirula Vaibhavam during Bharatiya Vidya Bhavan’s Sravana Sangeetha Lahari festival

title: Scientist C.G. Ramachandran Nair passes away
content: As chairman of Science, Technology and Environment Committee, the precursor of Kerala State Council for Science, Technology and Environment, he played a crucial role in shaping policies that have had a lasting impact

title: Those Involved in TTD scams will be punished, says APSBB Chairman
content: Neelayapalem Vijay Kumar alleges ₹2,000 crore misappropriation during Bhumana Karunakar Reddy’s tenure and assures a thorough investigation to bring all culprits to justice

title: Rising civilian traffic strains IAF airfields as AAI expansion lags
content: So far, 39 IAF airfields opened for UDAN scheme; shortage of parking bays, extended operations leads to delays in turnaround for civilian flights; can also affect IAF activities as it provides tech support, says Defence official

title: Karnataka to bring out White Paper on allocations received for centrally-sponsored schemes
content: Chief Minister Siddaramaiah alleges that the Central share has dwindled under Narendra Modi government and the Central allocations are not proportionate to the Budget size

title: Naidu reaffirms support to NDA candidate Radhakrishnan
content: We are very happy to extend our support to him, he will bring pride to the nation, says TDP chief in the wake of Congress’s call seeking support to its V-P candidate Sudershan Reddy, a Telugu person

title: UDF health conclave seeks to find an alternative health-care model for Kerala
content: Over 250 experts, including leading doctors from the U.S., U.K., Canada, Bahrain, and Dubai, join deliberations. Conclave’s outcome will be compiled into a document by January, which could serve as a roadmap for Kerala’s health-care system

title: Godavari floodwaters inundate 928 homes in Konaseema
content: Second flood warning remains in force at Dowleswaram with inflow exceeding 13.50 lakh cusecs; 3,300 people along the banks of the Vasista affected; In Chintoor agency 32 villages along the banks of river Sabari and Godavari affected

title: Niti Aayog recommends model policy for homestays
content: Its report released on Friday aims at advancing a framework that States can adopt to harmonise regulations and establish an inclusive homestay ecosystem in the country

title: LDF to begin hunger strike from Saturday as NHAI fails to begin road repairs
content: Local body leaders of LDF in Melur, Kadukutty and Koratty panchayats say NHAI has failed to keep its promise to start work in pothole-filled corridor of NH 544 at Muringoor, the worst-hit stretch.  They say they will launch an agitation if the authorities do not start work on Friday night

title: Staff union urges Governor to intervene in KTU’s financial deadlock
content: The Confederation of University Employees Organisations submits memorandum seeking disbursal of salaries and pensions for employees and retirees of the university. Chancellor asked to direct V-C to authorise financial expenditures, including salaries and pensions, until the Budget is formally passed

title: Karnataka lost close to ₹80,000 crore owing to illegal iron ore extraction
content: Karnataka suffered close to ₹80,000 crore in losses in the illegal iron ore extraction scam, Law and Parliamentary Affairs Minister H.K. Patil informed the Legislative Council

title: YSRCP demands action against NDA Cabinet Minister over misconduct allegations
content: Party leader Bhumana Karunakar Reddy cites TDP spokesperson’s revelation; questions Chief Minister Chandrababu Naidu on disciplinary measures

title: 'Dumper state': Rajnath's reply to Munir's Mercedes statement; 'confession, not troll'

title: New York finally solved Minnesota -- what does it mean for the WNBA playoffs?
content: the Minnesota Lynx and New York Liberty won 85-75 on tuesday . they've played four games in a three-week span . new york coach Sandy Brondello says she wasn't thinking too much about playoffs .

title: The Eagles face challenges as they gear up to try and repeat
content: the Philadelphia Eagles' depth will help them overcome potential setbacks from injury . the defense is led by one of the best in the business in Vic Fangio . many of the impact players from that group are back, and all are considered ascending players .

title: Matchup in Ireland is among the last for the Farmageddon football rivalry

title: 10 European storylines to follow: Liverpool and City rebuild, Barca's defense, more

title: Transfer rumors, news: Spurs turn to Nkunku after Eze snub

title: 🏈 2025 Fantasy Football Draft Guide
content: this draft guide will serve as a one-stop shop for all of our best material as you prepare to make the best fantasy football picks possible in every draft you're in . we have everything needed to help you draft a great team and start the season with a shot at a championship.

title: The best picks for each draft slot in Rounds 1 and 2 in 10-team leagues
content: squon barkley's draft is the best time for fantasy managers to draft . if you're worried that your most desired player won't be there by the time you get to pick, we exhaust too much energy sweating this particular topic . you've come to the right place to start your team off strong .

title: UFC Fight Night: Expert picks, best bets for Johnny Walker vs. Zhang Mingyang
content: Zhang Mingyang has three first-round knockouts in his first three UFC bouts . his opponent, Johnny Walker , is the only other person in history to have won his first 3 fights by KO . the co-main event features two top-10 featherweights in ESPN's divisional rankings .
